SELECT no, coffee, kind, price, to_timestamp(#{reg_day},'YYYY-MM-DD')as reg_day, to_timestamp(#{mod_day},'YYYY-MM-DD')as mod_day FROM coffee_menu where no = CAST(#{no} as INTEGER)

mapper.update: update coffee_menu coffee = #{coffee}, kind = #{kind}, price = CAST(#{price} as INTEGER), where no = CAST(#{no} as INTEGER)
mapper.delete: delete from coffee_menu where no = CAST(#{no} as INTEGER)
